displayName: Dataproc Long Running Job - Job in RUNNING state

conditions.displayName: Dataproc Long Running Job - Job in RUNNING state

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch cloud_dataproc_job
| metric 'dataproc.googleapis.com/job/state'
| filter metric.state == 'RUNNING'
| group_by [resource.job_id, metric.state], 1m
| condition val() == true()
